import { Component ,OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(public auth:AuthService){ } ngOnInit(): void { console.log("id auth from token: "+this.auth.getAuthorDataFromToken()._id); } }
